caption: It’s a part of a movie. The theme of the movie is spy and agent. A man in black is trying to kill another man who is lying on the bed. But he is stopped by his fellow. They are sad, and they have a phone call. Then the news station says something on the TV. The man on the bed is happy and he is laughing, however, then he finds himself being cheated and he is despaired. Then there’s a small video, and they go to the airport. At the entrance of a plane, a man and a woman is arguing.

global.question: Are there more then three  different backgrounds appearing in the video?
